name: J Mo1636
text: Nice little coffee shop off the road. Try Matt's Mocha with extra shots. 😁😁

resp.text:
You call the shots at Island Fire!  :)
Thanks for sharing your photos!

name: Heather Zirlott
text: Beautiful art work! The sweet girl that we spoke with was a joy to be around, we loved the whole experience, and being able to sit outside and enjoy the atmosphere was amazing.

name: Moiira
text: Great coffee and great service. Baristas are very nice and the coffee is phenomenal. Love this place. It's a great place to just hang out. Nice little building, too.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: brett garrick
text: Beautiful gallery with an ecclectic selection. The coffee was great and the owner was an awesome dude. Look forward to stopping in again.

resp.text: Thank you Brett.  It was a pleasure meeting you!

name: Erik Albrecht
text: Some really amazing and creative pieces here.   Ended up taking 4 trips and purchasing everytime.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much for supporting our local artists Erik!

name: BurntScone Oops
text: Beautiful work, I couldn't afford it at the time, but the prices match the work put in. Cousin got the coffee and said it was good.

resp.text: Thank you Burnt!

name: Stefan Russell
text:
What a nice surprise! Great coffee drinks with actual espresso and a good variety on the menu. The taste of my caramel macchiato with sweet almond milk was perfect. It had a unique flavor. Maybe the salt air? ;-)
Beautiful glass artwork and paintings for sale in a gallery that reminded me of some of my favorites in Key West. Friendly and personable proprietor as well. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Stefan. I didn’t use the salted caramel in your drink, so I think you’re right—it’s the Salt Aire salt air. Maybe we can try that next time.  We’ll have some new glass items on Tuesday.  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Happy Travels
text: Super cozy shop with excellent coffee. Check it out!

resp.text: Thank You Happy!

name: Lisa Donald
text: The gallery is beautiful. However, prices are very high and they only had coffee, no food.

resp.text: I'm glad you liked our Gallery.  We try to have a wide range of art,  ranging in price from $15 to $10,000.  Prior to COVID, we served fresh pastries.  When we re-opened after COVID, we weren't able to sell the pastries, so have temporarily stopped serving them.  We do have some snack items, but we never intended to be a restaurant--Just an art Gallery with an espresso bar.  Google had automatically labelled us as an "Art Cafe", and perhaps that has caused some confusion.  I have changed the Google Classification to more accurately reflect our offerings.  Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again soon!

name: Lynne Burton
text: The blown glass artwork was beautiful. The coffee drinks were delicious and the patio was so peaceful.  Great place!

resp.text: Thank you Lynn!  We are glad that you enjoyed relaxing on our porch. 😌

name: Samantha Havard
text: Always great coffee!

resp.text: Thank you-glad that you enjoyed!

name: Amanda Courtney
text: Beautiful artwork and great coffee!

resp.text: Thank you Amanda!

name: Kelly Birkhead
text: Great little coffee shop!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly!

name: Mike McDermott
text: Fantastic

name: Tom Kish
text: Agree with others on this one.  Don't list it you cannot visit, ONLY patients and visitors.  No one from the outside is allowed in.

name: Martha Curry
text: Very good

name: David W
text: Bad attitude and messed up our order

name: Robert Gonzalez
text: This is inside of a hospital and you’re not allowed to go inside to get coffee so they’re not open.

name: Cheyenne Morrison
text: Very quick service and my drink was on point!

name: Kristin B
text: Best drinks and amazing staff!

name: Shirley Drosyk
text: Yummy

name: Catherine Burley
text: Staff is always super friendly and my food/drink orders are always correct and tastes great!

name: Kara Wilke
text: The staff was polite but the drink was terrible. I had order a basic mocha frappuccino, but it was so water down i thought I was drink bitter water. The croissant was good. You can't mess that up.

name: Ash Ford
text: I waited in line for at least 20 minutes. I ordered a caramel ribbon crunch. I got ice blended coffee. There’s no caramel, and there wasn’t any whipped cream. I asked if they were out. They had just assumed i didn’t want it. They put the whipped cream on for me, but failed to add the crunchy topping. It’s horrible and the service was not friendly.

name: Jacob McCalpin
text: Chanel is the greatest barista of all time. I'm here every morning at 7am. The manager is a nice guy too. Good service. Good coffee. What else do you want from a Starbucks?

name: sam dillon
text: Wouldnt let me use my Starbucks gift card.  Said the system was down. I saw the reviews and walked across campus anyway.  Will not come back here again.

name: Alex Z
text: The food is always warm and delicious but the service is horrible. I wait in line forever and I end up getting the wrong thing. Also, the same women is there every time I go and she is so rude! She rolls her eyes at me and doesn't greet me and never tells me my total, she just puts her hand out and waits for my card. PLUS their blueberry scones are very dry and not flavorful at all.

name: Noah Taylor
text: I was at UAB for the Science Olympiad event, and went in with a couple of friends. I wanted to try the Cherry Mocha Frappuchino and when I ordered, the lady working was somewhat rude and said, “No, I’m not making that because I’m here alone.” When there was only four of us in there and two people sitting and eating at a table. I went back later and got one when two people were working and she still acted annoyed about it.

name: James Drummond
text: The location is a franchise of sorts operated by Sodexo, the food service intermediary working on contract for the university. As a result, the service is not and will never be up to Starbucks's standards. This is less about the quality of the food & beverages, and more to do with the quality and friendliness of the servers. I personally have only had to deal with slow service, but that could happen at any time during a rush. The worst stories come from others; I have been around while the building was hosting an added-security event, which required the presence of LEOs; the baristas refused to provide him with a glass of water without charging him. At other foodservice locations in the same building and operated by the same company, not even students are charged for water glasses. That one event does a good job summarizing the apathy and disregard the employees have for their customers. Another critical issue is that this location doesn't accept Starbucks's own rewards program, which is extremely annoying after having signed up for the program just for the convenience of the location being in the same building that I work for. I've personally made a resolution to never purchase another item at this location again.

name: Matthew Pearson
text: Go to the one in Sterne. This place is a mess. Wrong size coffee, stale croissant, long wait.

name: Craig Winn
text: Open early and well staffed.

name: Tim Fisher
text: Good service, well-trained staff.

name: Hunter Jackson
text: They're stepping it up!

name: Richard Robinson
text: The woman with short black hair in drive thru was very rude and she didn’t my order right and then got another attitude. Overall the service was horrible.

name: Lexi Ivan
text: I waited over 20 minutes for one latte, just to have them cancel my order without warning. After asking, apparently they didn’t have the flavor I wanted, but instead of seeing if I wanted another flavor, they just cancelled my order... huge waste of time before class.

name: 하지용
text: Delicious 😋and  cozy cozy

name: Nawin Yanpirat
text:
You cannot use your Starbuck reward here.
Also, ordering your drink via Grabhub is way much easier than waiting in the line for 20 minutes in the late morning.

name: Kim Johnson
text: So disappointed for the second time with this Starbucks inside Target. Last week the young lady barely warmed up my croissant and sorta threw it to me. She tried to force a top on the overflowing drink until I said something. Today was another bad experience. No Croissant(not her fault) but I got the chocolate one instead. Again, not warmed up enough. I tried to order the same drink I LITERALLY ordered on Friday and she lied about them not making it anymore. I mentioned that I had just ordered it on Friday. She got snippy and made it but it wasn't correct. I told her(which took a lot for me) that it wasn't supposed to be warm. She rudely said "you didn't say ice. I never have said iced and have always gotten it the way I like it. Then she makes another one and I tell her how it's supposed to be BUT NOPE! Still wrong. This time I just took it and trashed it before I walked out of the door. I bought a offbrand Mocha from Target. So basically $10 wasted. I won't be going back to this Starbucks. Their workers need more training.

name: Will Slappey
text: Always super fast and get the orders right.

name: Daphne Deborah
text: don't drink it I always love coming here and when I come here I'm usually never disappointed but how bad can Starbucks mess  up anyway. Who who doesn't love coffee it's a great pick me up

name: Harrison Parrish
text: Service is always nice even when they have a full house. The bill was decent. Reminds me of a cafe in Chicago I liked to visit.

name: KRISTIN BOOKER
text: I was in line  tonight at 7:59p.m. behind 3 patrons together ordering 3 beverages. I was immediately told "We're closed!" When asked the time the store closed, the young lady stated 8:00 p.m. It's customary to serve those in line during operating hours. I will follow up with corporate in the morning.  Even the patrons in front of me were shocked at her response and her lack of customer service normally provided at this location.

name: Craig Winn
text: A Starbucks inside a grocery store. Way to go Target. What a great idea to upscale and distance yourself from Walmart. The store is not well staffed nor very clean compared to an out parcel store.

name: Cam Natalee
text: I usually go here, today i went & the barista was super nice and smiley. It instantly made my mood way better before having to go to work. And the coffee was the best I’ve gotten from this location. She needs a raise

name: Nekko
text: Starbucks is great overall. They are not staffed well. The workers are overwhelmed with customers. One worker is taking orders and making coffee.

name: Ashley Mize
text:
A few minutes before 8pm and the starbucks barista was RUDE and told us they were closed!
Will not return to this starbucks or target.

name: Brielle Morales
text: I love coming to this place!the vibe is just great

name: Peggy Jackson
text: What's NOT to love especially having their amazing treats first thing on New Year's Day Morning, as a surprise! AAA++++

name: Noah
text: Coffee

name: Roxann Knox
text: Expensive

name: Taylor Johnson
text: My drink was perfect. I seriously have nothing bad to say about that but i made sure to come on here to leave a review because it took THIRTY minutes in the freaking drive through. Not even kidding. Absolutely ridiculous. This isnt the first time either.

name: Samuel Mendoza
text: The lady in charge was being rude. Would not do her job right or at all. Was very dirty and  it was not managed right. I did not get a drink because no one attended me because they were to busy talking to each other. Will not come again!! Dont waste your time here

name: M Stevens
text: Very busy Starbucks, fast moving drive through with easy access in and out. Convenient location with friendly staff.

name: Sam Taylor
text: Ordered a pike place with 1/2 & 1/2.  They tried to challenge me 60cents for the 1/2 & 1/2.  I questioned it and the girl said it comes black.  Anything added is a charge.  I walked out.

name: Ashley Williams
text: I LOVE this place! The staff are awesome and friendly. If you go there enough, don't be surprised if they recognize you and begin to punch in your order! It's great. I love the atmosphere, the openness of the counter, the different seating places, etc. I just think the company could be heavier on the branding in the seating areas. Its never overly crowded and you don't have to worry about a drive thru. And I also love that I can relax here before or after shopping, and drink a coffee while getting groceries.

name: Maggie
text: Do not go. One staff was not wearing a mask during my visit.

name: Cannon Fallder
text: It's ok coffee. Price is too high for quality of drinks

name: Grace Tatum
text: When they first opened they were having some issues, but they have quickly been resolved. Taste just like every other Starbucks except not as busy! This isn't a corporate starbucks though. So, if you are going for one of their specials, like the buy one get one free drinks they promote sometimes, it will be regular price here. However, they still use the app.

name: beth white
text: This is my favorite Starbucks location. The staff are always incredibly friendly, have never gotten my order wrong, and seem genuinely happy to be there.

name: Edel Lopez
text: Like each Starbucks,  the perfect place to get my Venti Vanilla Latte ... Yummy!

name: Steve Bridges
text: Excellent we are travelling from NZ clean fast and really friendly.  Not all of the chain stores are as good as this one.

name: Ted Townley
text: Employees are friendly however since this is a Kroger owned Starbucks they don’t work with other Starbucks promotions. Bah humbug

name: Emili Dye
text: Baristas are fast and friendly.

name: Jessi Xu
text: Like any other Starbucks. Drinks are a little too sugary and pricey to go frequently.

name: Sarah Revoir
text: Slowest starbucks.. Every staff member has no idea what they are doing. Takes you 10+ minutes to get your order.

name: Laura Griffin
text: Great coffee but mediocre atmosphere and service.

name: Todd McGrath
text: Good

name: Blake Barnwell
text: Slick place to get some twisted coffee. I like the outdoor seating! Great place for a snack.

name: Alice Collette
text: Finally it was open when I was in Opelika.  Great service from barista who truly enjoyed making craft coffees that the customers would enjoy. The best latte in the area.

name: Melanie R
text: Fantastic! only disappointment about this place is that we don't have one in my city! The staff was super friendly and helpful with choosing something to order. I absolutely loved the atmosphere, the bathroom was clean and the vibe was chill and cozy. I hope to return soon and would definitely recommend to friends, family and anyone curious to try a new coffee spot.

name: Alina Meadows
text: I literally just left this place 15 minutes ago and sat down to eat my Alabama slammer biscuit and drink my latte. If you have never been to Mama Mochas you need to get over there. The food is great and it’s some of the best coffee I have ever had. They have some really cool artwork and things for sale in there too and it’s local so that’s always a plus. Highly recommend!

name: Kandice Bamberg
text: The weather was nasty so they were closing early. Service was still absolutely amazing and I can imagine this is a great little place to sit and sip coffee when weather permits. Our drinks were also yummy!

name: Morgan Rambler
text:
Wonderful staff! The tall gentleman who took our order was enthusiastic and full of wonderful suggestions. We actually all ordered what he suggested to us and all five of us were in love with them. We had the White Russian, two Salted Caramel Truffles, a Drunken Waffle, and a Honey Bomb. As well as two banana nutella pie things and a egg biscuit. All of them came out perfect.

Half of us live in St. Pete Florida and kept talking about how well this place would do there, it has an amazing amount of drinks and friendly staff. I really enjoyed the experience and will 100% be back next time I find myself in Opelika. I live in Columbus and wish we had this place there.

name: Daniell Lyfe
text: Very friendly and helpful staff

name: Jacky H
text: Coffee is always spot on. I have never had to worry about the shots being "off" and the roasts are always perfect. The atmosphere is great, too, but my favorite part is the exceptional customer service.

name: Mark Miller
text: Love it!  Fun and Funky.  My favorites, mocha and breve latte, are always consistently good.  Excellent staff.  They actually roast coffee here.

resp.text: Thanks mark! We LOVE coffee and doing what we do. Your support means so much!!! ❤️

name: Aaron Spraggins
text: The best coffee in the state. Try an Iced Crack or it's evil twin, the dark crack (with mocha). Also some of the best whole bean coffee around!

name: Philip Dugas
text: Excellent Service!!!  Good Vegan Options with Top Notch Coffee' and Tea's...  Worth the money for sure.

name: Neal Niswender
text: This is my favorite local coffee cafe. They have a great selection of teas and chai plus of course coffee. My daughter loves their Apple cider which is made with apple juice and chai. Plus she loves their selection of pasteries. The location is great right in the middle of downtown Opelika and is easy to get in and out. They have good sandwiches also.

name: Kathryn Early
text: Excellent cold brew! Friendly people!

name: Ginger Stern
text: Great food and wonderful coffee from fun people in downtown Opelika.

name: Lindsay Tan
text: A literal hole in the wall, this place is easily overlooked but it has excellent coffee and breakfast items. Reminds me of a cafe in New Orleans.

name: Connie Reese
text: Small, friendly, delicious food and so many different coffees.

name: Eric Van Horn
text: Great coffee, great service, great people! I have not met anyone there who was not extremely friendly nor have I had a drink I didn’t like (I have not tried their food).

name: Amy Lasitter
text: Friendly staff and a great selection of yummy treats.

name: Matt Rowlett
text:
Two words. Bendy. Straws.

But seriously love this spot in DTO the great mama mochamochas coffee and breakfast in an adorable bodega.

name: Sloan Gaither
text: Great people serving great coffee. Can't ask for anything more.

name: Allen Adams
text: Always like the coffee here and it's a nice change of pace.

name: Chris Randolph
text: Great coffee from great people in a great happening place.

name: Melina Brown
text: Simply, undeniably awesome!

name: John Gustin
text: Great coffee, great breakfast, great service. Very friendly!

name: Gallano-Velez Consultech, LLC
text: Excellent coffee and excellent people serving it!!

name: S Z
text: Great coffee & awesome service!

name: Dennis Hamlet
text: Great options, service, and atmosphere

name: Kay Ohtie
text: Always a fun place for coffee!

name: kerry mcginnis
text: Best coffee in the known universe!

name: David Pugh
text: The best coffee in Alabama!

name: Erica
text: Nice atmosphere, good people

resp.text: Thanks Erica!!! We’re putting our heart into it!! ❤️❤️❤️

name: James Clark
text: Great breakfast, coffee, and staff

name: Michael Huff
text: Always great

name: Hailey Cooper
text: It says they open at 6 but the worker said they do not open til 7 , then she was very rude about it.

name: Janita Ball
text: Never get service with a smile here. It's like the people at this one hate their jobs and they are more expensive than the one on the other side of Tiger Town by Waffle House. Won't get my money again. The one in the Auburn Kroger is great. This is the only one that I've encountered employees who were so rude. The drinks were good though.

name: Lori Kellet
text: We just ordered cappuccinos and I’m not sure they knew how to make them or maybe just didn’t care. There was a single espresso shot and then she spooned in the top of the frothed milk - no blend of the two. No heated milk at all - that was poured down the drain.  This was repeated twice as we ordered two - I’d guess at least 3/4 pint of milk was poured down the drain. I’ve never seen anything so bad from Starbucks. When I said I’m not sure these were made correctly she says they were. I left them instead of getting a replacement bc they didn’t  know how to make them the first time and my husband waited 15 mins for them.

name: Wally Armstrong
text: Great coffee

name: William Clark
text: Great coffee and Donuts. Iced tea is also great. Gets busy around 6AM - 7AM as this location is within an industrial park. No other food in area.

name: Birthday Bandit
text:
I stop by here often because it's on my way to work.
The DD Perks app is so cool!  I can order exactly what I want and it's usually ready right when I walk in or darn close to it.
The comfy seating area is a plus too if you just wanna relax and enjoy your purchase.

name: Michael Connolly
text: Sad to see this location close up. I stopped here regularly, both mornings and afternoons. The staff was friendly and the location was convenient to my work. I was so disappointed to pull up this morning and read the sign that it was permanently closed. My wife looked forward getting those iced coffees in the evenings.  :(

name: Carleen Yates
text: I had a great experience when I went in the food sandwiches and lattes are so delicious

name: Ian Cobb
text: I used to live up north in they only had Dunkin Donuts up there at the time and only one Krispy Kreme which was ironic Dunkin Donuts are everywhere had to drive through two states to find one Krispy Kreme I'm from Mobile Alabama and moved to Newark Delaware birthday Donuts both very different styles

name: Ziggy Zane
text: It's your run of the mill donut shop. The donuts are too heavy for me (prefer KK) but the donut holes are awesome.

name: Gene Strickland
text: I bought a dozen filled doughnuts. Well they didn't have a teaspoon of filling in them. Bought a 2.49 doughnut and should have been .75 cents. 1.99 coffie was as small as you could possibly make a cup. To pricey for everything. I will stick with KK

name: Wayne Chai
text: Typical Dunkin Donuts franshise, but if you're around Brookley Aeroplex, this is a must go for your breakfast needs since there aren't anything else around.

name: Tony McIlwain
text: Love the iced Caramel Machiato!

name: Jason Nicholson
text: Great coffee, always fast service

name: Anessa Williams
text: Ordered a certain sandwich but they were out of the bread it came with mgr said they were waiting on a truck then i ordered hash browns and they were out of those as well

name: Angel Flythe
text: Clean. Fast. Simple

name: David Puzar
text: Clean.,Used DD,app food ready when I walked in. Truck parking close by.

name: Ricky Hopkins
text: Very friendly staff!

name: Luis Guillermo Palacio
text: Clean place

name: Matthew Mabrey
text:
Delicious light-roasted . Visited twice during our week-long stay. The Bushwacker blend has incredibly flavorful berry notes that especially come out when you mix with sweet cream flavored creamer.

I normally drink my coffee straight but at the roasters recommendation I tried the Bushwacker with cream and it was delicious.

16 oz drip was $2.89
Bag of 1 lb beans was $13 ( ended up buying a bag for the rest of the week).

Tables outside and inside for use.
If you are particular about coffee, this is your spot!

name: Jennifer Seal
text: Loved our coffee from here. A local coffee shop that roasts their own beans. Great place and cute shop.

name: Honor Warren
text: I had the Salted Caramel Frappe and my daughter had a Caramel Mocha one. Both were delicious and the staff was super friendly. 10/10 recommend!

name: Leah Holland
text: Ok! Just left and will be back tomorrow! I never ever leave reviews, but felt I should because it’s soooo yummm! People were waiting so I quickly ordered my go-to caramel macchiato, which is delicious. I noticed the Bushwacker on way out and the super nice guy came over and gave me a sample with sweet cream.  Ummmm so good! So smooth, so fresh, so distinct! I’ll be back! Now sippin it on the beach. Thanks for perfection and making my day start off great! Simple joys you all provide!

name: Ed B
text: Great coffee! Sending someone from Missouri to pick up some more!

name: Adam Baldy
text: Friendly service and truly excellent breakfast sandwiches. Coffee was great as it should be.

name: Cole Schimek
text: Some of the BEST coffee I’ve had in the South! I’m from Minnesota and I like a good strong coffee and this is the BEST!! It’s awesome that he does everything by himself from getting green Coffee beans to putting it in the cup for you to drink!! Highly recommended!!!!!!

name: CausIsaid
text: Great selection. Tasty treats. Little pricey but it’s an island coffee shop. Friendly staff. Good afternoon picker upper!

name: Floyd Bakos
text: I prefer my drinks naturally flavor and sweetened. They're definitely not the one I am looking for. Mung bean milk tea is premixed which means sugar level not adjustable. Panden flavor and color are pretty artificial. It's loaded of sugar, I couldn't finished 1/4 of it. 3 stars is for the service. I drove back and got my refund promptly.

resp.text: I believe that you have the wrong restaurant. We’ve never had any type of milk teas on our menu. Please remove this review.

name: Rickey Garris
text: I'm not sure what I was more excited about...finally trying the birthday cake latte, or realizing that they sold mochi muffins here! I wanted to order one of everything but decided on the cookie butter latte, since my boyfriend ordered the birthday cake latte.

name: Cindy Mindy
text: Best coffee I have ever had in my life!!! This is a life changing experience! You must try the Cuban Latte.... WOW!  I even got to see Mark roast some of the coffee right there in his shop. This is by far the best coffee shop and my new go to when visiting Gulf Shores. I will need to stop by the Foley location on my next trip.

name: Shana Bell
text: Excellent coffee and service. The bushwhacker coffee is roasted in-house and delicious! Can buy bags in the store.

name: Joel Martin
text: Neat local coffee roaster. Friendly owner, and most importantly, smooth tasty coffee.

name: Mary Gray
text: Incredible people and super welcoming shop. I love coming here with my husband and my kids. They are super friendly and always happy to answer any questions. Used to be a die hard fan of a huge coffee chain, but since coming here I can’t wait to come back!! Amazing coffee, amazing atmosphere, amazing people, and amazing food!

name: Joshua Dinkins
text: Excellent French press coffee. Fresh roasted beans and knowledgeable staff. Thanks!

name: J
text: I discovered this beautiful coffee haven from Ciara, a very sweet employee from the hotel that I was staying at on business. It was an hour wait in the drive thru a few days after hurricane Sally hit the area. Yes, I waited that long. Let me reassure you that it was worth the wait!! It was my first time experience so I had questions. Even with the growing line behind me, Mary was so patient and kind with me. She made me the most delicious coffee that kept me coming back the entire 2 weeks I was in Foley! Thank you to the kind ladies of Southern Shores Coffee House for making my stay so very memorable! I'll be back!!!!

name: DC Home
text: Simply the best! the best service, coffee and pastries in the gulf area! treat yourself to a bushwhacker and a muffin in the morning! the coffee is fresh brewed and the pastries are home made! you won't be disappointed at either location!

name: Megan King
text: This place is absolutely incredible!!! My dad owned a coffee shop when I was younger and roasted his own beans in store which created some of the best quality coffee you could imagine. The first sip I took immediately took me back to my younger years at my dads cafe. The BEST quality coffee!! If you are ever in Gulf Shores, you have got to make this your coffee spot! You will be disappointed if you go anywhere else!!

name: Bodie Bachelor
text: Mark fresh roasts his coffee right in the shop. He makes all his own blends from green coffee grown all over the world. He has a first class Astori espresso machine & is well skilled in steaming milk for quality micro foam. The store is spotlessly clean & definitely beach themed. He went to great lengths to make sure our drinks were just right & definitely wants to please his customers. He also offers free samples of his Bushwhacker brew, which is very tasty!

name: Ruby Anderson
text: Favorite coffee in the city! And cute friendly little staff. Always pleasant and chirpy. Great to see in the morning.

name: LovelyLiddy
text:
Smoothest, best tasting coffee in Foley, hands down! Delicious house-made foods desserts, New York bagels (Their bagel sandwiches are awesome!) and macaroons straight from France.

The owners are kind, personable and open to their customers’ comments. Mark sources his beans selectively and roasts them himself at their Gulf Shores location across from Hope’s Cheesecake and his genuine passion for the craft of coffee is very apparent in the products they serve and produce.

They also have a drive-thru if you don’t want to go inside, but you should... they have a pool table and great A/C.

name: Rick Goldsworthy
text: Southern Shores is THE place to go to get a variety of locally roasted beans. Not beans roasted elsewhere and packaged for the shop (aka "private label"--which Southern Shores Coffee will do for other places). The couple I tried were solid. Note, I am not an added-flavor guy so I have no idea how any of the flavored roasts would be -- why would you do that to coffee! JK, to each his (or her) own. There are other great places in the area if you are wanting more of the cafe vibe (or gelato, more food choices, or a cuter atmosphere) but for coffee beans and great coffee, grab beans here. I tried the drip, which was good. Cannot comment on espresso base this time around so will need a return trip for that. Also, Finger Lickin' Good donuts is right next door, so you can't go wrong!

name: Hanna Slaughter
text: Super flavorful dark roast cold brew. The decor is amazing and very well designed. Service was amazing and the owners were very nice! They roast and infuse their own coffee beans and ship all over. Will definitely be coming back when we are back in town. Clean restrooms and access to a parking lot with no stairs. They also have their own roaster and dairy alternatives like almond and coconut milk! They were even able to make a decaf espresso for my mom! Definitely a great place to stop by for great coffee and friendly vibes!

resp.text: Thank you for your thorough review.

name: Jon Junkin
text: Great coffee and the hard-working owner is happy to talk shop and share his insights. I’ll be back for some more samples and to try their breakfast burritos/other breakfast offers!

name: Fink Condo Rentals LLC
text: Sweet people. Coffe is great. Many different choices and flavors. They roast onsite and have samples for you to try. We've needed a coffee shop on the island and this is great!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review and the pictures added to google. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Montrea Posey
text: Delicious coffee- amazing people!

name: William Wright
text: Infused flavor coffee! It’s amazing you have to try the bushwhacker infused iced coffee! Also has a very nice patio to enjoy your beverage. Mins from the beach!

name: DeAnn Telarico
text: The Cuban Latte is addictive.  The owners of this shop are so nice and food and coffee are delicious.

name: manuel conde
text: The worst coffee. I just got the Bushwacher and it tasted awful. Don't waste your money. Maybe they can show me how to make it to tast like a Bushwacher. There was no paper in the box. That was misleading. I will ship it back to you. You should have disclaimer.

resp.text: While everyone has different tastes, yours is the first complaint that we’ve ever had on Bushwacker coffee. There should’ve been a paper in the box that shows which creamer to add to the Bushwacker. Ice cream cannot be roasted into coffee so we roasted the coffee to the creamer, just a little of the creamer and the coffee will taste just like the Bushwacker cocktail.

name: Katie Tackett
text: I love coming to this coffee shop every time I come to Gulf Shores!! The workers are so sweet and I always feel so welcomed when I visit. The coffee taste amazing and I even buy bags of coffee to take home with me! 100% recommend visiting this cozy coffee shop!

name: Candace Graves
text: Excellent coffee! We had a great experience! The owner is friendly and knowledgeable. He even had coffee out to sample before we made our decisions.  We will definitely be return customers on our next trip down.

name: Jennifer Reid
text: My daughter and I got lattes on our way out of town. They were delicious and we heard another gentleman telling the barista that His chi drink was the best he’d ever had.  Don’t miss this out of the way coffee shop. Egg, sausage burrito was good too.

name: Chloe Carlisle
text: very friendly staff! great iced coffee & nitro cold brew with an awesome breakfast selection. best of all— very cheap!

name: Bryan W. Rowe
text: This small business does their own blending, roasting and grinding in-house. Wonderful people and coffee with many great house blends!!

name: Brian Hampton
text: The atmosphere is super chill and definitely represents the beach life. The smiles are contagious and the customer service is excellent. What about the coffee? THE COFFEE IS 🔥🔥🔥🔥

name: Pamela May
text: Southern Shores Coffee is a delight to have in the Foley area....fresh coffee, delicious treats and a soothing atmosphere... not to mention all the beautiful blondes ready to serve up the best coffees in Foley!!

name: Bre Sullivan
text: Good coffee, good prices. The owner is very friendly and knows his stuff about roasting coffee. This was a great stop on our vacation. The birthday cake coffee is the best coffee I’ve ever had in my life. More like a dessert!

name: Renea Eyman
text:
My favorite all vegan treats. There are few places that have such a variety of exquisite delights as this place. This is a fun and interesting atmosphere, friendly yet creatively punk hip workers will answer any question.  This place has it all.
Southern Shores Coffee.

name: Nancy Smith
text: Sweet baristas, very helpful!!

name: Hawk1
text: Excellent service and products. My kids got a real kick out of the cutely decorated frappes!

name: Francesca Esposito
text: It was amazing! The peach tea was amazing and I loved the cheesecake! 100/100 service :)

name: Blade Gray
text: This place is awesome, so many drink choices and homemade whipped cream! Love the people, love the environment!!

name: Pep Whirley
text: Loved it. Great coffee friendly service. Can’t wait to go back for more!

name: Chrissie Hesser
text: Amazing options! Love this place! Family operated and so welcoming to Thier patrons.

name: Mic Reul
text: Best coffee around.   He is the only roaster on the island and is very knowledgable about the coffee.  Mark and his staff are friendly and greet everyone with a smile

name: Blyn Vyborny
text: Delicious coffee and deserts. Great afternoon pick me up.

name: Eliana Vercellino
text: We were stranded just minutes on our trip back to TN. Luckily we pulled into this place and across from Advanced auto. They were super kind to us. We had coffee and food. Took 3 hours to get our car up and running. But this experience couldn’t have been better thanks to this place!!!

name: Bob Bross
text: Super cute and owner is really friendly.

name: Rose Strotman
text: Best place ever for coffee and small bites. Homemade & propriety coffees hot & cold. Amazing service. Family owned. Awesome cinnamon rolls made fresh daily. Home of the Famous Bushwhacker coffee also roasted daily. Nice sandwiches and breakfast items.

name: Blade Gray
text: This place is awesome, so many drink choices and homemade whipped cream! Love the people, love the environment!!

name: Blyn Vyborny
text: Delicious coffee and deserts. Great afternoon pick me up.

name: David Gomez
text: This place has a really nice atmosphere, friendly staff, good food and great coffee.

name: Brandy K
text: Cute, charming and delicious

name: Michael Jenkins
text: I love this little coffee shop, and go there often. So many varieties of coffee roasted in house. And the local owners are genuinely nice people!  Stop in for a cup and be sure to take a bag or two for home. Our friends love getting them as gifts!!

resp.text: Thank you Michael.

name: Amber Davis
text: Excellent coffee

name: Jackson Chism
text: Wanted to surprise my wife with coffee from a local shop while we were on vacation. Stopped in and asked the owner (I’m assuming) for recommendations on what to get her. Got home with the coffee he recommended, and my wife absolutely loved it! Great coffee and great people!

resp.text: I’m so glad to hear that your wife liked her drink. Thank you for the great review!

name: Michelle R.
text: We were on the hunt for coffee and found this great place. My husband always drinks an Americano and said his was delicious.  I tried the Cuban latte and found it amazing.  We both had a breakfast burrito - again, so delicious! The proprietors were very welcoming, and it was clearly a place the locals frequent.  They roast their beans on site.  We will be back.

name: Matt Koon
text: Love this local coffee shop! Get the bushwacker coffee!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Matt. It was great to meet you.

name: Amy Henschen
text: I'm baffled by the good reviews for this place. Ordered a pour over and flat white. No one was waiting for drinks when we got there and they had 2 staff members, yet the flat white took 10 minutes and the pour over 15. Both were mediocre at best. Do not recommend.

resp.text:
I apologize for your experience. In reviewing this situation the pour over you ordered was done in an 8 cup Chemex which takes roughly 10-11 minutes with prep time start to finish. The coffee used was a light roast Ethiopian  yirgacheffe. The Yirgacheffe may not have been the coffee you as it is a light roast with a citrus note.
Please reach out to us via Facebook, email or phone 251-442-5415 as we would like the opportunity to correct this for you.

name: Wendi Kinsey
text: Hidden gem! Cute cozy quite place to just sit and enjoy a cup of joe!

name: Sharon Phillips
text: Amazing Bushwacker coffee!!! Locally owned!!! ❤❤❤❤

name: Enos Henderson
text: Great!!!!! Service.   Just show up and you’ll see. Oh yeah coffee pretty darn good too!!!

name: Gay Ann Bakker
text: Good customer service

name: Hollie Palmer
text: Absolutely delicious coffee! I ordered a hot mocha and I was not disappointed! Even my husband, who dislikes the "coffee" taste of coffee said it was good! If you're debating between the sizes of cups, do yourself a favor and get the bigger size! You will not regret it. I would definitely reccomend this place to anyone looking for some coffee in Gulf Shores!

name: Rusty Newton
text:
Friendly service, delicious breakfast sliders and robust flavorful coffee. Nice outdoor seating area if the weather is good. Affordable prices on top of all that!

I'm only here on vacation, but if I'm in the area again I'll be back!

name: Tommy Braggs
text: The chicken salad croissant is AMAZING!

name: Stephanie Baldridge
text: We came sliding in at 4:00 and he stayed open so we could get our coffee fix. Coffee was fabulous! Great conversation, great place! Thank you

resp.text: Thank you for the great review. I enjoyed meeting you and your family, we hope you have a great time while you are in town.

name: Amelie Thomas
text: Very nice and sweet people here and the coffee and food selection is more diverse than a normal coffee shop and not to mention tastes good too. Thanks for the caffeine.

name: Savanna Tays
text: Loved this place. The owner was very nice

name: Nicole Miller
text: If you’ve been looking for excellent coffee, look no further! We were visiting from Dayton, Ohio and found this gem (thank God for the coupon book at Rouse’s market). You MUST try the Bushwacker coffee (Mark’s trademarked flavor)...Hot is fantastic and the cold brew of it is even better! We went back 3 times and got extra cups of coffee to go for early beach walks the next morning....that’s how much we loved it. Also tried a Mocha with caramel and the frozen sea salt caramel, both of which were legit. Bought some whole beans and can’t wait to relive this taste of paradise when we get home. Mail order beans here we come! Thanks Mark for the enriching experience and thanks Mark’s wife for your dedication and contributions of which Mark spoke so highly!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Nicole. It was great to meet you both, we look forward to seeing you on your next trip down.

name: Robert Orr
text: Great coffee and service. Owner very friendly. Lady working the cash register is super nice.

name: Priscilla Russell
text:
Best coffee shop around, and a game changer for the veg scene. Everything is delicious and well made, place is beautiful, and there is now twice as much seating.
Southern Shores Coffee.

name: Kaela
text: I just had the best pumpkin latte I've ever had.

name: Ashley Johnson
text: The best coffee on the beach! The service is always amazing and the atmosphere is perfect.

name: Pam Carson
text:
Mixed smooth, cold brewed coffee with Almondmilk, best ice coffee in a long time, fresh-baked peanut butter chocolate chip cookie hit-every note.
Southern Shores Coffee.

name: Kath Katherine
text: Such an awesome find on Piedmont Ave.  TImeless serves up excellent pour over coffee and espresso drinks all while maintaining veganism throughout the process.

name: jj liebel
text: It's not hard to find a decent cup of coffee down in gulf shores but if you're looking for exceptionally good flavorful fresh roasted indulgent coffee this is a must go to if to just try there Bushwacker and blueberrie roast.  Luv this place and the Cuban latte was exactly what I needed.  Thank you

name: Amber Fieck
text: Stopped here on our way back home from a beach vacation in Gulf Shores. I WISH I HAD DISCOVERED IT SOONER! I would have been here every single day of my trip! Superb coffee and espresso beverages, amazing service, very clean, and an inviting beachy atmosphere. Well worth a stop!

name: Matt Koon
text: Love this local coffee shop! Get the bushwacker coffee!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Matt. It was great to meet you.

name: Maria Jimenez
text: Cute place, very friendly, delicious coffee 👍🏼

name: Bailey Whitcomb
text: We visited this coffee shop while on vacation! We ended up coming back every morning because it was so good. Very clean and amazing customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Bailey. We appreciate it.

name: Hoffmann Rexhaku
text:
This place great coffee simple is European
I love this coffee great owner thanks for coffee🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.

name: Emily Carrico
text: Our cycling team stopped by on a ride to grab some drinks and food. The man working was super friendly, brewed fresh decaf coffee for us, and gave us an extra tea for free! Even more, he filled our water bottles for us, without us even asking. Super friendly service and delicious coffee!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.

name: Chuck n Peg Allen
text: Found this southern gem and can't wait for tomorrow morning to get some more. The owner is very knowledgeable and conscientious about what he brings to your table. A real delight to find!

resp.text: It was great to meet you, we are looking forward to seeing you again tomorrow. Thank you so much for the great review.

name: Beverly M2017
text: Was in town for Hangout Fest, my friends and I came across this coffee shop gem! Great customer service and coffee! If you love legit coffee and are in the area, it's a must stop place to get your fix!

name: sheila reul
text: Best coffee around. Love the owners and their  knowledge  of coffee.  Not to mention the only roasters on the Island.

name: Adam Hochstedler
text: Awesome coffee shop! We were in town for vacation and found this gem the first day. I assume we will be here several times while in Gulf Shores. Thanks for the great service and coffee!

name: Wes Ludloff
text: Decent place, good cold brew and friendly service.  Menu is written on a dry erase board and a bit hard to read...maybe use bigger lettering when you change menu items.  Will be back!

name: Elaine Mcmurray
text: Amazing coffee shop!!!!!!!   Amazing delicious coffee!  Owner roasts coffee beans inhouse!!!!!!   Now I need to get them to move to Michigan...😏

name: Bethany Lee
text: Great customer service and pretty excited that they carry whole coffee beans. Thanks!

name: Penny G.
text:
Saw it on face book, thanks to Jim Parks, our neighbor and went by this morning after a beach stroll.  Very artsy upscale shop who roasts their coffee and ships nationally as well as provides a variety of breakfast items, sliders, letc., and a hefty variety of specialty coffee beverages! Samples offered!!!
So excited to do business with a convenient Local rather than traveling further to buy from the other large national Chain💥. A must try if you Love coffee.  Stop by and get to know Heather and Mark☕️☕️☕️☕️😎

resp.text: It was great meeting you, thank you for the feedback. We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Kylee Engleman
text: So happy that we found this place!!! Great coffee & hot chocolate. We had a wonderful experience with friendly service. Will definitely be back!

name: Leah McLaughlin
text: The owners are super nice & the coffees they roast taste phenomenal! We will be back!

name: Yew Bark
text: Cute coffee shop!  Friendly staff, wonderful frappes and cold brew, nice atmosphere and good prices!

name: Jamie Smitty
text: Finally a great coffee shop in Gulf Shores and bonus they are coffee roasters!!! The owners are very nice and will tell you everything that you ever wanted to know about coffee from countries all over the world. Highly recommend the Nitro.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.

name: Virginia Faith
text:
This is a very nice place with great coffee and friendly people! They handled our large group beautifully.
Definitely go!

resp.text: It was great to meet you and your family. Have a safe trip back home. Thank you for the great review, and enjoy your Bushwacker coffee.

name: chevytech1965
text: The blueberry coffee will have a permanent place at home. They ship!!!

name: Chancee Terry
text: Absolutely awesome place and owners! Very knowledgeable and personable. Must stop if in the area! Tell em Chancee from ttown sent ya!

resp.text: It was great to meet you. Thank you so much for the great review!

name: Vaughn Hensley
text: Love this place! Everything is good. Cinnamon Rolls are amazing.  Prices are good. Staff is friendly. Highly recommend.

name: Russell Schiek
text: Unique and tasty selection of coffee. Very clean and nice atmosphere. Staff is friendly...great place.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Russel!!!

name: Ashli Hodge
text: Best coffee, cutest decor, and most genuine people on the island... hands down.

resp.text: Thank you for your great review Ashli it is greatly appreciated.

name: Lorraine Hosking
text: This place is great!  Great coffee, Great food in a fun enjoyable atmosphere. You need to treat yourself to this experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review

name: Jinger Entrekin
text: Wonderful coffee shop, the flavor was amazing. The staff was wonderful the place is clean and has some great souvenirs! #shoplocal

name: Katie Lee
text: I ordered a mocha iced coffee and it was the most amazing cup of coffee I have ever had! The staff there is so kind, and the shop is very clean.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Katie.

name: Walter Riggs
text: This is the best coffee you’ll get within 200 miles.  Go next door for the best donuts and you’re good to go.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Walter.

name: Caleb Marrett
text: Great coffee and owner was very helpful on which blend I'd like. My wife also loved the infuse Peppermint Mocha blend which I also tried and was surprised just how spot on it was for just making it with the beans.

name: Raqui Marshall
text: Fresh roasted coffee, flavors all made in house from organic ingredients, homemade baked goods. Everything you  could want in a local coffee house.

resp.text: It was great to meet you. Thank you for the great review.

name: Debra Chiczewski
text: Very pleasant early morning treat here.  Ordered short Americano that was made to perfection.  Also ordered Ciabatta ham and cheese panini that was delicious.  Highly recommend and Mark was very friendly too.

resp.text: It was great to meet you. Stop in and see us before heading back home. Thank you for the review!

name: A Fay
text: The bushwhacker coffee is amazing!!!! Highly recommended if you are in the area!!

name: kathleen LoVerde
text: Best place for great coffee! Nice people too!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kathleen!!!

name: Philip Marks
text: This place is quite the gem! Amazing coffee and owners!  This place gets all my money

name: Kelly Ogilbee
text: What a beautiful coffee shop, with GREAT tasting coffee and sandwiches!! So glad to see actual Roasters!!! Love it here!!  #amazingcoffee #roasters #southernshorescoffee

resp.text: Thank you for the great review

name: Thomas clark
text: Found this place while driving to a different coffee shop in Gulf Shores, and so glad that we did. They are actual coffee roasters, so much better than the other coffee shop that we typically go to.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review

name: Cole Hamilton
text: Had the macchiato. It was very good.

name: Steve Noling
text: If you’re a coffee drinker, you owe it to yourself to visit this place. Outstanding service with delicious food. FANTASTIC!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review

name: Anna Lisa Nist
text: The cappuccino was great! They even had unsweetened almond milk when I was there.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.

name: dawn kobos
text: Great coffee! Owner was lighthearted and fun!

name: James Arnold
text: Great local coffee!

name: Mike Chiodo
text: Great place for coffee food and friendly banter.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mike!

name: Kenneth Robertson
text: Great coffee and friendly service!

name: R Cov
text: Such friendly owners and delicious coffee!

name: Ruth Dunwoody
text: Excellent coffee and fun atmosphere!

name: Kaleigh D
text: Great coffee

resp.text: Thank you Kaleigh!

name: Oh grow up
text: Excellent customer service!

name: Mark Naugle
text: Best coffee in town

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mark, it is greatly appreciated.

name: Sandra Lindsey
text: Great fresh roasted coffee!

name: Robin Peed
text: Good coffee.

resp.text: Thank you Robin.

name: Bradley Hancock
text: Great tasting coffee!!!!

name: Allen Savage
text: Great coffee

name: Kate Reimer
text: The real deal

name: Blake Whitt
text: I honestly loved this coffee the first three weeks of them being open. But the last few times I’ve ordered a cold brew(which has been incredible in the past), I have received what I assume is nitro cold brew, but it tasted like club soda mixed with a funky coffee taste. Hopefully they figure out that something has changed and the cold brew does not actually taste like cold brew.

name: Bobby Lovell
text: Talk slow when you order.  Workers don’t seem to be trained or supervised. I discussed with the supervisor. Let’s see if they improve.

name: GARRY BARKSDALE
text: I had a Iced Coffee with a couple of extra shots this morning. It is wonderful..

name: Nicole Cecil
text: For a chain it's not bad coffee I enjoy the people who work there!

name: Rachel G
text: Great coffee and the employees are so nice!

name: Amanda Thomas
text: My new FAVORITE coffee shop!!!!... friendly, time efficient, and most importantly the ☕ is fabulous ☺️

name: Jean
text: This place is convenient being right off 72, but no one working there knows how to do T-Debit and it's very frustrating. The other one in Madison never has issues with it.

name: Sendero7mm
text: Always nice, coffee and sandwich was good as well

name: Kristian Campbell
text: Well I decide to go try this coffee out. Ask over 3 times for regular coffee. Guy proceeds to tell me it take 7 mins. Well isnt that your job?? Anyways i didn't get coffee I had to drink the coffee with caramel in it after telling him 3 times I want regular coffee I won't be back! He needs another job obviously! I told him 5 times i didn't like caramel as well! That might be why your drive thru is empty!

name: Doug Johnson
text: Great coffee and far far better than Starbucks. I just wish there was one closer by instead of driving from Madison to Athens!

name: tammy king
text: Please get equal and sweetness, this is the first Starbucks I've ever seen that didn't have it, and make sure you have the sleeves to go on the hot cups, apparently yall were out, because only one of us got one, the other two were in double cups

name: Joshua Watson
text: Besides of being always crowded it's a good place to enjoy a nice warm coffee

name: Ugarte Aurelia
text: The staff is beyond helpful & kind. Everything flows so smoothly & I’m never in the line for longer than 5 minutes. A great addition to Jacksonville!

name: Olya Williams
text: Ordered a cold brew - got a warm half a cup of something. Guys that's not how it works. Cold brew tastes different. "Well, we were out of cold brew so we substitute with espresso shots". How about if you are out of something you tell me and let me decide what to substitute it with? Plus why half of a cup?? I paid the full price right? Not half...My day just got worse...was so hoping for a good cup of coffee...

name: Connie Sparrowhawk
text: This experience was excellent. The one prior was very bad, that's why it is three stars. I gave them another shot, and the service was excellent!

name: Jennifer Carruth
text: The drive thru was backed up so I went inside and they were extremely friendly and helpful and gave me my requested items in a very timely manner even while they were overloaded with mobile and drive thru orders. Great people and beautiful store! Will definitely be going back over and over again! 🙂

name: teresa Frisby
text: I kinda wish I had not tasted Starbucks at all because I am completely addicted now!!! Lol but I will tell you I haven't met a rude person working there yet! They are so sweet to me and my dog Jinger everytime we visit. However I told them they need to get their landscaping monitored because that big tree is crooked and leaning bad and will die soon and their bushes are lacking water! Meanwhile.... I love Starbucks Jacksonville

name: Colin Hendrickson
text: A Starbucks oddity - - adequate parking! Also nice to see a new store with Baristas who know their stuff.

name: jason smith (stump)
text: Out of ribbon topping again. Messed up drink ordered and had to go back .

name: Nick Williams
text: The line was long, so I went in not even 3 minutes got my order and was great. This is the second day it’s open so they’re doing great.

name: Alexandra Stevens
text: Went through the drive thru and my frap tasted awful, and they gave me a leaking cup without even trying to wipe it down.

name: Shirley Mckerley
text: Employee's very nice

name: abby evans
text: It is so good

name: Missy
text: When they are finally able to allow people to sit inside it will be a five star. Great place great people. Finally can sit inside. Got a great staff. Really nice people

name: Robert S
text: They need some work

name: Amanda Newkirk
text: They didn't have my white mocha so they made something that tastes just like it! No other place has ever done that!!! I am very happy!

name: Stephanie
text: Overall very good.  I was really excited about trying the chicken salad after reading the reviews.  It was not good at all.  There was hardly any dressing and chicken had the texture of something that had been run through a food processor.  Pasta and broccoli salad was fantastic!!!

resp.text: I’m sorry you did not like the chicken salad. We cook chicken breast and chicken thighs fresh and shred the chicken. Glad you liked the pasta salad and broccoli salad though. Thank you for your review.

name: Mollie Unruh
text: Oh. Em. Gee!!! This place is amazing. I could have bought every single thing in this place and tried them all! I got some cookies to try, the pimento cheese, sausage balls and a hot hazelnut latte. The two employees working (one was Lindsey) were SUPER friendly and the atmosphere and decor inside was SO CUTE! I love it here.

name: Carolyn Jones
text: First time there on a Saturday afternoon. My daughter took me. She really likes the food. I got a salad trio plate. The price is comparable to others who serve this type of food. I reccomend it. Easy to find in Hartselle downtown.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Denise Barnett
text: I love their chicken salad! I love their pretzel salads! I got pineapple pretzel salad today and it is the very best!! I ate there every day for lunch for a week! They’re always very friendly! They also have it decorated so pretty! Such a nice place to eat! Dine In or Carry Out.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business. We are so glad you love it. Come back and see us.

name: SincerlyTee
text: If you are local and haven't stopped by here you are missing out!! I picked up a few cupcakes and cookies and omg by FAR the best cake mix I have tasted in a long time!!! I was mad I didn't pick up more! Lol. Just Decadent!! The staff was friendly upon entering!! I'll be back!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback and we appreciate your business. Please come back and see us. Happy Easter!

name: Sarah Hamilton
text: I absolutely LOVE this bakery!! Their cakes and cookies are to DIE for and the ladies that work there are SUPER sweet!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We appreciate your business. Please come back and see us.

name: Sharon Hunter
text: Lovely local place with the friendliest of staff. And the Mounds candy bar cookie - oh my! Definitely worth a stop and support local business.

resp.text: Thank you Sharon! We hope to see you again soon.

name: James Newcomb
text: Quaint small town shoppe with food and treat selections that are to die for!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in.

name: Nancy p
text: Very good

name: Nelson Reburn
text: Friendly staff and delicious cookies!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in. We are glad you loved the cookies.
